name: [IGP - 0001] - Shimmer Community Grant Committee Revision Proposal

questions.text: Do you support the revision of the Shimmer Community Treasury Grant Committee Framework according to the changes proposed in this Governance proposal?

answers.additionalInfo: I approve the proposed framework revision
I don't want to implement the proposed changes.

additionalInfo: The IOTA voters agree to allocate 10 million IOTA Tokens through a donation from the IOTA Community Treasury to the Tangle Community Treasury Grant Committee and accept the operation specification outlined in the following proposal. Read the full proposal here: [https://govern.iota.org/t/sgp-0006-igp-0001-tangle-community-treasury-grant-committee-framework-revision/1675]
